thread.title: Clive Allen
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Clive Allen

author: Clive Allen
title: Clive Allen
text: I've just completed a private journey to South Africa, Zambia, Botswana & Namibia - a very complicated 17 day journey that included the Rovos Train, Cape Town and surrounding areas, Kruger National Park, Victoria Falls and a river cruise on the Chobe River. All the pieces fitted together like a 1,000 piece jigsaw puzzle, and apart from some serious inadequacies on the part of British Airways, every thing was perfect - thanks in part to the meticulous planning and attention to detail by Goway. Wonderful stays at the Twelve Apostles, Singita Ebony, and the Royal Livingston, and on the Zambezi Queen. Couldn't have done it without Pat Lalonde.
